What it is: Identifies when a word, label, or concept you use has shifted in meaning internally.
How to use it: List identity terms or self-descriptions. Ask AI if any now hold different emotional or symbolic weight.

What it is: Scans for ways you distort your truth to manage approval, safety, or clarity.
How to use it: Describe a time you told the truth. Ask AI to identify distortions and what they served.

What it is: Identifies the symbolic currency that once kept you safe and now limits you.
How to use it: Describe what traits helped you survive. Ask AI to assess if they now restrict growth.
What it changes: Rewrites survival logic as growth strategy.

What it is: Unlocks grief that has been deferred or buried.
How to use it: Describe an event you haven’t grieved fully. Ask AI to simulate an activation sequence to open the channel.

What it is: Turns your biography into a mythic arc with thresholds, symbols, and trials.
How to use it: Describe your life stages. Ask AI to reframe them as part of a hero’s journey, epic, or legend.
What it changes: Upgrades identity from linear to symbolic.

What it is: Detects repeating mood, posture, or behavior loops.
How to use it: List your emotional state across several days. Ask AI for energetic or behavioral loops and a pattern-breaking gesture.
What it changes: Interrupts trance cycles and restarts momentum.

What it is: Extracts actionable insights from symbolic dream data.
How to use it: Describe a dream. Ask AI to translate key symbols into specific waking actions.
What it changes: Bridges unconscious guidance to real-world steps.

What it is: Finds identity-level loyalties you’ve outgrown but still serve.
How to use it: Describe groups or ideals you once aligned with. Ask AI to simulate a conscious renegotiation.

What it is: Expands your emotional-symbolic lexicon to increase expression range.
How to use it: Describe a stuck feeling. Ask AI for new symbolic words, imagery, and metaphors to name it more precisely.
What it changes: Increases expressive power and emotional literacy.

What it is: Dissects myths you carry about love, friendship, or loyalty.
How to use it: Describe a relational pattern. Ask AI to identify the mythic narrative behind it and whether to evolve it.
What it changes: Decouples identity from inherited relational scripts.
